finalScript:
Two hundred thirty million people. That's how many Americans can now access Verizon's C-band 5G network. Welcome to this week's Verizon Intelligence Briefing.

Verizon deployed 45,000 cell sites to reach 230 million peopleâ€”hitting 90% of the target ahead of schedule. As CTO Kyle Malady said, 'This is transformational for our customers.' We're delivering 300 to 500 megabits per second on average.

bindings.scriptSnippet: This is transformational for our customers

checkMarkers.note: Verified C-band 5G coverage claim against evidence unit eu-001
